Signal stretching¶

BlockCanvas oriented¶

velocity_change_estimete Velocity change estimate through stretching and comparison.
time_windows_creation Time windows creation.
time_shift_estimate Time shift estimate through shifting and comparison.
time_shift_apply Apply time shift to traces.
time_stretch_estimate Time stretch estimate through stretch and comparison.
time_stretch_apply Apply time axis stretch to traces.
multi_ref_creation Create the multi-reference traces
multi_ref_vchange_and_align Multi-reference dv estimate and alignment
multi_ref_vchange Velocity change estimate with single or multiple reference traces.
est_shift_from_dt_corr Estimation of a baseline shift between velocity-change measurements preformed with different references.
estimate_reftr_shifts_from_dt_corr Combine velocity-change measurements of the same data performed with different references to a single curve.
dv_panel_creation Create pandas.Panel objects recombining corr and dv curves
